text: Oliviero Toscani (28 February 1942 – 13 January 2025) was an Italian photographer.Current Biography Yearbook 1999 Elizabeth A. Schick – 1998– Page 571 He was known for designing controversial advertising campaigns for Italian brand Benetton from 1982 to 2000.Prayer Graeme Garrett, Oliviero Toscani – 2000Tungate, Adland: A Global History of Advertising pp 138–43 Toscani was hospitalised on 10 January 2025 in Cecina, Italy for problems caused by amyloidosis. He died three days later on 13 January, at the age of 82. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2025 deaths Category:Deaths from amyloidosis Category:Italian photographers Category:Artists from Milan
